channel.title: Comments on: Lens: With Wings, Roots, and Sweaty Hands

item.description: […] concise thought, Anna was usually quick to respond with “Germany”. Considering how much this type of question can provoke discussion and bother me at home, I was surprised at how quickly I followed suit and resigned myself to the “put me in a […]
